short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to modify the MSNswitch2 Power Switch Control page by hiding unnecessary elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simplifies the UI of the MSNswitch2 network controlled power switch. The extension only modifies based on the MSNswitch2's default IP address.
